title: "Megan Rapinoe!!!" (BONUS episode)
description: Jon, Jon and Tommy sit down with World Cup champion Megan Rapinoe for a special bonus episode. They chat about her team’s triumph, her beef with Donald Trump, and how she’s using her platform to fight for pay equity and LGBT rights.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
